description.p: Get the difference in years between two datetimes.

prototypes.prototype: YearsBetweenDateTimes as N (DateTime1 as T, DateTime2 as T)

description.p: Returns the difference in years between two datetimes.

discussion.p: The YearsBetweenDateTimes function computes the difference in years between two datetimes.

example.caption: YearsBetweenDateTimes() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 OrderDate, CurrentDateTime() AS Now, YearsBetweenDateTimes(OrderDate, CurrentDateTime()) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =08/04/1994 12:00:00 00 am|10/10/2019 12:45:57 00 pm|25
